name: Brave survivors
description:
At the fairgrounds of Fallingwater in brave land, our princess Lina seems to have had an unwaking nightmare, in which her companions are imprisoned in demonic cages, only by rescuing all your companions and gaining full strength to defeat the Nightmare King can you return to reality and assist Princess Lina! ! Be a survivor! !! !

Upgrade the weapons, choose your favorite skills. Unique combination with skill and role. A 14 minutes roguelike experience, shoot with fantastic and exciting experience!!

Believe yourself and beat the boss!
